ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I have chosen you for Myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And I chose you for Myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I have chosen you for My service.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And I created you especially for Myself.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I have chosen you for Myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I have chosen you for Myself:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I have chosen thee for My service;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And I have attached thee to Myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I have chosen you for Myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And I chose you for Myself.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And I have prepared thee for Myself (for service)"..
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I have Istana'tuka, for Myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I have chosen you for Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And I made you for Myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I produced you for Myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:41] And I chose you for Myself, to deliver the Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And I have attached thee to Myself) I have selected you for Myself by favouring you with the message. 339
